content: crochet a cute hot dog with this free 1 crochet pattern **limited time deal from july 11 2021 - august 11 2021** this pattern is the first of 6 patterns in the the fast food amigurumi bundle become a member and unlock this pdf + and upcoming bundle pdf patterns also unlock access to our crochet forum exclusive video tutorials and coupons join here 2 **supplies ** yarn 4/medium weight yarn in red yellow and light brown 4mm crochet hook 10mm safety eyes for bun optional - 6mm safety eyes for hotdog tapestry needle scissors stuffing **additional information ** difficulty easy ** getting started** this hotdog is pretty easy to make there s a bit of assembly involved but i provide photos and explain how to assembly each part of this hot dog first we will make the hotdog itself then make the buns after this we will assemble everything together and make the mustard ** recommended yarns ** joann fabric s big twist yarn red heart super saver yarn hobby lobby s i love this yarn 1 https //stringydingding com/hot-dog-amigurumi-food-free-crochet-pattern/ 2 https //members stringydingding com/
